headline: Second Debate Is Canceled as Biden Courts Nevada
text: The second presidential debate was formally canceled late Friday after President Trump refused to participate in a virtual event, the latest sign of the upheaval that the coronavirus has wrought on the 2020 campaign.
snippet: President Trump has refused to participate in a virtual event, so next week’s debate is off. Instead, there may be dueling town halls on the same night, as the president ramps up plans for resuming his rallies.
